channel.title: How Do I Add GWD?
channel.description: i was wondering how i add gwd, like where u do ::gwd, kill 20 sara wizards, then go down a hole to general graardor and kill him once and then be teleported out

item.title: How Do I Add GWD?
item.dc:creator: @koopa_king koopa king
item.description:
@koopa_king wrote:

Go in to your command section, do

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("gwd")) {
    teleportToX = [XCoord];
    teleportToY = [YCoord];
}

Then, put in 8-10 saradomin wizards wherever you want your god wars to be (use autospawn.cfg to spawn them).
Make it so that to go down the hole, you need to have killed 20 saradomin wizards.
Put in General Graardor through your autospawn.cfg.
Then go into your NPChandler.java
Under NPCkiller (Or whatever it is called)

[code]
if (npcID == [GeneralGraardorID]) {
ppl.teleportToX = [XCoord];
ppl.teleportToY = [YCoord];
}

I believe all of that should work.[/code]

Read full topic
